meanings.sent1: The cat and dog were interacting playfully in the yard.
meanings.sent2: The students were interacting during the group project.
meanings.sent3: The toys seemed to be interacting with each other when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The colors on the painting were interacting in a harmonious way.
meanings.sent5: The characters in the book were interacting in a way that brought the story to life.

meanings.sent1: The team members were interacting effectively to solve the problem.
meanings.sent2: The children were interacting with each other using hand gestures.
meanings.sent3: The robots were interacting with each other in a language only they understood.
meanings.sent4: The different departments were interacting seamlessly to complete the project.
meanings.sent5: The birds were interacting through their beautiful songs.

meanings.definition: To engage in mutual action or influence
meanings.sent1: The chemicals were interacting to create a reaction.
meanings.sent2: The planets were interacting with each other through gravitational forces.
meanings.sent3: The weather elements were interacting in a way that surprised the meteorologists.
meanings.sent4: The ideas were interacting in his mind, forming a new perspective.
meanings.sent5: The dancers were interacting gracefully on stage, captivating the audience.
